title: Ohio Natural Energy Institute
cleaned_text: OHIO NATURAL GAS & OIL We Make Life Better Every aspect of our daily life is made better because of homegrown Ohio natural gas and oil. Lives have been saved, changed, and made better from this essential energy source. All Natural. All Ohio. We deliver the truth about essential energy. The Truth About Gas Prices Ohio can keep energy prices stable. Watch our video to learn how. Keeping Ohio Strong We may not always recognize how natural gas and oil are part of our lives, but we would if they were gone. $97.8 Billion invested in Ohio 208k Ohio jobs supported 37% Reduction in emissions $769 Million paid in taxes 6000+ Everyday Products
